## ğŸš¨ Emergency Restore

If anything goes wrong:

```powershell

.\restore-backup.ps1

# Option 2: Manual restore
# 1. Extract ZIP file
# 2. Open terminal in extracted folder
# 3. Run:
npm install
npm run build
npm start
```

**Result:** Back to working state in 2 minutes! âœ…
